Summary: Not visible while taking photo, came up after download
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around July 31st 2006
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in a boat on the Hudson River & we stopped for awhile and I took some photos. The object wasn't visible when I shot the photo but appeared after it was downloaded. There also may be another one that I just noticed, not sure though. It's a spec at about the 10 o'clock position above the three masted schooner. I've attached 2 photos. The one I took and I've cropped the other one to show the detail. I'm not sure of the exact time but it was around sunset. I also have another pic where the same thing happened but this was in Maine. I'll send it separately.
